page.title: 07THREE BUILDERS
page.content: My Dad is a self employed builder. He uses a white Ford Transit. He works in Lewes, Bexhill, Brighton and Burgess Hill. He can do all types of building, including brick-work, roofing, glazing and tiling {My Dad starts by knocking down walls {and then helps to re-build them in {different places. Sometimes he works {on new houses. He is working on a {cafe conversion at the moment. Bricks {are very expensive, that is why {building costs a lot to have done.} My Dad works for a firm called Burfoots, which started about 50 years ago by Mr. Burfoot. My Dad is the foreman and there are about twenty men that work for the firm. They work in the town and around the area and can do all the different jobs required in the building trade. DAMIAN F. TERRY H. PAUL T.
